data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DsGSik527F8Q7kNvgFxB_Z9&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAKMphcNvbjGx7CiCH0G_OX13O5oIUNmeSepWZWEQRAkA&oe=66A8CF1C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=oWdOObBE8QUQ7kNvgFQKdRB&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCV5erT1iRS2x6bVsX9O6HaukgDPGjtOwxETF6EUAUbTQ&oe=66A8D8A4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=f8z2HqvVFtUQ7kNvgFMxz_o&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCzN4lLOaGpdkTmBvnfOo6o1RFdB0C78zooJcmV3uyWbQ&oe=66A8C007)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=4IAMYAU-hBUQ7kNvgF7M2fT&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBiJhT6-WvKnsi7ToBrb3AO3yqhywCoVVkKSEKswzSXpQ&oe=66A8B2E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XsGh3FbJNcgQ7kNvgHYBwqM&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDXv6VxlkWFgRutebGBs5OpeiPvEKGqyDtoOH6QJGus6Q&oe=66A8DF58)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=w8FpLU8OWTgQ7kNvgGSEgcQ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC3EbSHhuvrY_-bocf7omL3kO-_fQ4-vf8PS80mj5RL-Q&oe=66A8DBD9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=HODvnANTutQQ7kNvgGk4mx8&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCQKypVFErl9hsCThLAKFP0zz3V0SJh98vE_zGtnEPTVw&oe=66A8C1F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ZdxuZ6SAH1wQ7kNvgEoHrNA&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA2l-prlekd8TcgyGpuegSNTb5Mn70QoMu5f7b-t2kbSg&oe=66A8AC6A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=duXZXcvI4oYQ7kNvgFUkpTL&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAc95qQUwDOzOtyhrz9u32qD_NJwCtUMd7CaiDz8WnpMA&oe=66A8C017)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=SE6cze_nw3sQ7kNvgFnioM1&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDZH9aS-VmrRPGC4CJw8hD49AI738uBCVnwDn0RxqClUQ&oe=66A8DB8C)
